import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/user/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent{ constructor(public userService: UserService) {} get isLogged(): boolean { return this.userService.isLogged; } get email(): string { return this.userService.user?.email || ''; } }
